amendatorysection.para: It is the intent of the Legislature to have a scrapie control and eradication program. The goal of the program is to eliminate scrapie from the animals of the state through a process of eradication and surveillance. The program shall be designed to eradicate scrapie from all flocks where scrapie is found and to use surveillance to achieve and maintain scrapie-free conditions in the state. The department in cooperation with APHIS will enforce the program subject to the availability of funds appropriated by the Congress of the United States or the Legislature.
